item.title: Cheatsheet
item.description: Docker commands cheat-sheet Containers docker container ls == docker ps docker container top {cont_name} - top command for cont docker container inspect {cont_name} - json with all cont parameters docker container inspect {cont_name} --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress}}' docekr container stats (like watch but for containers) docker container start -> start stopped cont docker container post {cont_name} -> shows shared ports Network docker network ls docker network inspect {network_name} docker network create --driver docker network connect {network_name} docker network disconnect {network_name}
